comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: More biographical information here: www.aaa.si.edu/assets/images/collectionsonline/robemary/f... In 1927, Mannes was well known for his annual series of evening concerts at New York's Metropolitan Museum, which drew 7,000-8,000 people per evening. The photographer, Nickolas Muray, was well known as a celebrity and arts photographer (as well as being the painter Frida Kahlo's lover). For more examples: nickolasmuray.com/portraiture

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and artolog: thanks for the additional information.  We may add it to the record.
